summary: A collection of general-purpose utilities for handling medical imaging data within MONAI. It includes helpers for converting affine matrices to voxel spacing, extracting and iterating over image patches, managing and cleaning metadata, performing dataset partitioning and cross‑validation splits, computing hashes for reproducibility, and providing custom collate functions for PyTorch data loading.
business_intent: Enable developers of AI solutions for medical imaging to efficiently preprocess, sample, and load large volumetric datasets, ensuring correct spatial metadata handling and reproducible data pipelines for training and evaluation of deep learning models.
